sentences.english: What is the final result of monocular amblyopia?

sentences.chinese: 目的探討單眼弱視的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Monocular diplopia is mostly resulted from operative complication.

sentences.english: Qin Hailu insured her particular single eyelid .
sentences.chinese: 秦海璐爲自己特有的單眼皮也投了保險。

sentences.english: If a child has a cataract in only one eye, you may not be able to tell.
sentences.chinese: 如果患兒只有單眼白內障，說不定您還發現不了。

sentences.english: Monocular diplopia is partly resulted from operative complication.
sentences.chinese: 單眼複視多爲手術併發症所致。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the monocular stereo vision algorithm based on bifocal imaging.
sentences.chinese: 對單眼立體視覺的雙焦成像算法進行了分析。

sentences.chinese: 該場可以是單眼的或雙眼的。

sentences.english: In actuality an Asian's single-eye-lid appearance is considered very essential in the eyes of the Westerners.
sentences.chinese: 事實上單眼皮的東方人的外貌對於歐洲人來說很必要。

sentences.english: Random-dot stereograms (RDS) do not have monocular cue in testing stereopsis .

definition: to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)
to pull a face/to grimace/to scowl
(of fruit etc) fresh/(of a person etc) full of life/healthy-looking/(of eyes) moist and bright/lustrous
to keep one's calm in the face of the unexpected/not to wonder at strange sights
to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
to spar/to fight/to duke it out
